quote: You want something and you wait and wait and feel like it's taking forever to come. Then it happens and it's over and all you want to do is curl back up in that moment before things changed.
quote_letters: YOU WANT SOMETHING AND YOU WAIT AND WAIT AND FEEL LIKE ITS TAKING FOREVER TO COME THEN IT HAPPENS AND ITS OVER AND ALL YOU WANT TO DO IS CURL BACK UP IN THAT MOMENT BEFORE THINGS CHANGED
